info.title: Airly
info.description: Airly provides accurate, hyper-local data about air pollution in your community. This is the first step towards understanding the health risks and making improvements.

id.description: Unique installation identifier. Having InstallationId you can query measurements from particular installation.
id.title: Id

latitude.description: Installation coordinates - latitude. Exact sensor location on map.
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: Installation coordinates - longitude. Exact sensor location on map.
longitude.title: Longitude

country.description: Installation country. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
country.title: Country

city.description: Installation city. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
city.title: City

street.description: Installation street. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
street.title: Street

number.description: Installation street number. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
number.title: Number

displayAddress1.description: Extra field describing address, e.g. school name or number. Optional field.
displayAddress1.title: Display address 1

displayAddress2.description: Extra field describing address, e.g. school name or number. Optional field.
displayAddress2.title: Display address 2

elevation.description: Altitude at which device is installed; meters above mean sea level (mamsl).
elevation.title: Elevation

airly.description: Flag indicating whether this installation is an Airly device or not; e.g. GIOŚ stations are flagged as false.
airly.title: Airly

name.description: Name of this installation's sponsor.
name.title: Name

description.description: Additional description of this installation's sponsor.
description.title: Description

logo.description: Url pointing to sponsor's logo (jpg image).
logo.title: Logo

get.description: Operation returns single installation metadata, given by InstallationId.

parameters.name: InstallationID
parameters.description: Id of the single installation to get metadata.

id.description: Unique installation identifier. Having InstallationId you can query measurements from particular installation.
id.title: Id

latitude.description: Installation coordinates - latitude. Exact sensor location on map.
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: Installation coordinates - longitude. Exact sensor location on map.
longitude.title: Longitude

country.description: Installation country. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
country.title: Country

city.description: Installation city. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
city.title: City

street.description: Installation street. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
street.title: Street

number.description: Installation street number. Attribute is optional, may be empty or null.
number.title: Number

displayAddress1.description: Extra field describing address, e.g. school name or number. Optional field.
displayAddress1.title: Display address 1

displayAddress2.description: Extra field describing address, e.g. school name or number. Optional field.
displayAddress2.title: Display address 2

elevation.description: Altitude at which device is installed; meters above mean sea level (mamsl).
elevation.title: Elevation

airly.description: Flag indicating whether this installation is an Airly device or not; e.g. GIOŚ stations are flagged as false.
airly.title: Airly

name.description: Name of this installation's sponsor.
name.title: Name

description.description: Additional description of this installation's sponsor.
description.title: Description

logo.description: Url pointing to sponsor's logo (jpg image).
logo.title: Logo

get.description: Endpoint returns list of installations which are closest to a given point, sorted by distance to that point.

parameters.name: maxDistanceKM
parameters.description: Default value 3.0. All the returned installations must be located within this limit from the given point (in km). Negative value means no limit.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Default value 1. Maximum number of installations to return. Negative value means no limit

fromDateTime.description: ISO8601 timestamp. Date and time in UTC. The field represent start time from which the data in this payload was measured and averaged.
fromDateTime.title: From DateTime - current

tillDateTime.description: ISO8601 timestamp. Date and time in UTC. The field represent end time to which the data in this payload was measured and averaged.
tillDateTime.title: Till DateTime - current

name.description: Name (type) of the given measurement; e.g. PM10.
name.title: Measurement name - current

value.description: Measured value of the given measurement type, e.g. concentration 25µg/m3.
value.title: Measurement value - current

name.description: Name of the index (e.g. CAQI, or PIJP).
name.title: Index name - current

value.description: Numerical value of the calculated index.
value.title: Index value - current

level.description: Discreet level of the index (e.g. HIGH, or LOW etc.).
level.title: Level - current

description.description: Description of the index level. The text translated and returned in a language according to Accept-Language request header.
description.title: Description - current

advice.description: Additional text with advice regarding current index level. The text translated and returned in a language according to Accept-Language request header.
advice.title: Advice - current

color.description: Color representing index level in a form of hexadecimal RGB triplet (e.g. #D1CF1E).
color.title: Color - current

name.description: Name of this standard. Currently only WHO standards are supported.
name.title: Standard name - current

pollutant.description: Name of the pollutant to which this standard applies, currently only PM10 and PM25 are supported.
pollutant.title: Pollutant - current

limit.description: Certain average concentration level of the pollutant which should not be exceeded over given period of time; in other words, this is the value for which the pollutant concentration reaches 100% of the limit.
limit.title: Limit - current

percent.description: Concentration value of a given pollutant expressed as a percentage of this concentration in the standard / limit, e.g. for a standard of 50μg/m3 of PM10 the concentration of 25μg/m3 is expressed as 50%.
percent.title: Percent - current

averaging.description: Measurement values are interpolated by averaging measurements from nearby sensors (up to 1,5km away from the given point).
averaging.title: Averaging - current

fromDateTime.description: ISO8601 timestamp. Date and time in UTC. The field represent start time from which the data in this payload was measured and averaged.
fromDateTime.title: From DateTime - history

get.description: Endpoint returns measurements for any geographical location. Measurement values are interpolated by averaging measurements from nearby sensors (up to 1,5km away from the given point). The returned value is a weighted average, with the weight inversely proportional to the distance from the sensor to the given point.

parameters.name: indexType
parameters.description: Selects the type of the index which should be calculated and returned in response.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language in which text descriptions should be returned.

name.description: Name of the index.
name.title: Index name

minValue.description: Minimum value the index can return for the given level.
minValue.title: Minimum value

maxValue.description: Maximum value the index can return for the given level.
maxValue.title: Maximum value

values.description: Values the index can return for the given level.
values.title: Values

color.description: Color representing index level in a form of hexadecimal RGB triplet (e.g. #D1CF1E).
color.title: Color

get.description: Endpoint returns a list of all the index types supported in the API along with lists of levels defined per each index type.

name.description: Name of this measurement type, e.g. PM10.
name.title: Name

label.description: Descriptive name of this measurement type (field translated).
label.title: Label

unit.description: Unit of this measurement type e.g. µg/m3.
unit.title: Unit

get.description: Endpoint returns list of all the measurement types supported in the API along with their names and units.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language in which text descriptions should be returned.
